page.title: 05Trade in Morchard Bishop (1)
page.content: Only two general grocery stores remain from some six or more 25 years ago. One doubles as a news agency,the other as a butcher.Two dairies make daily doorstep deliveries and two bakers call twice weekly. A salon provides for ladies and mens hairdressing and the one public house has a restaurant service as well as a bar and off-licence. The village Post Office,saved by public support, occupies part of a gift and hardware store. A butcher from a neighbouring village makes two house calls weekly. Wet fish is sold by a travelling fishmonger weekly and at weekends a van stops in the village to cook and sell fried fish ands chips.
